definitions.definition: polite, respectful, or considerate in manner.
examples: polite, well mannered, civil, respectful, well behaved, well bred, well spoken, mannerly; Moregentlemanly, chivalrous, gallant; gracious, obliging, considerate, pleasant, cordial, urbane, polished, refined, courtly, civilized "our courteous staff is available 24 hours a day"Moregentlemanly, chivalrous, gallant; gracious, obliging, considerate, pleasant, cordial, urbane, polished, refined, courtly, civilized our courteous staff is available 24 hours a day
